channel.title: Projects on YUJIE HE
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on YUJIE HE

item.title: Teaching Assistant in Open Source Hardware and Programming
item.description:
Teaching Assistant from Sep. 2018 - Jan. 2019

  • Assisted first-year students major in Industrial Design to get started Arduino Hardware and Programming

  • Designed a series of the electromechanical module to give three lessons on basic mechanical analysis and design and gave a lecture on advanced RGBD sensors including Microsoft Kinect and Intel Realsense for the semester project

The following video is Mechatronics Module Experiments.

item.title: DIAN Racing Formula Student Electric Team
item.description:
Powertrain Group Leader from Sep. 2016 - Dec. 2018

  • Designed and optimized the overall powertrain system, including motor invertor, high-voltage accumulators, wheel-side planetary gearbox, and matching cooling system, to ensure China’s first leading four-wheel-drive Formula Student Racecar, with an 8% efficiency, 10% lightweight, and higher stability improvement
  • Participated FSEC 2016 - 2018 and SFJ 2018 as a senior engineer, DIAN Racing won first place in Engineering Design and Efficiency Prize, and Best Powertrain Award for two consecutive years.

The following video is virtual assembly of DRe18，which was what I worked for as Powertrain Group Leader.

Design Report Final @ FSEC19

item.title: SLAM and Autonomous Navigation for Skid Steer Wheel Robot
item.description:
Robotics Algorithm Development Intern from Jul. 2018 - Aug. 2018

  • Implemented sensor fusion between Pandar40 (a 40-channel LiDAR) and gyroscope to achieve 5% accuracy improvements on top of state-of-the-art SLAM framework, LOAM, and drew a 3D point cloud map of Tongji University Jiading Campus below 10m
  • Deployed control, decision, and communication algorithms for a self-developed skid steer wheel robot, realizing autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance in a $ 300 m^2 $ workspace

Indoor SLAM @ Hesai


Debugging the robot


Jiading Campus Satellite Map corresponding to the map generated from Pandar40

item.title: Super Power Robot Team
item.description:
Project Manager & Mechanical Development Leader from Oct. 2016 - Jun. 2018

  • Designed two main robots to participate international shooting competition, RoboMaster, achieving stability of the chassis and 3DOF pan-tilt mechanism and constructing multi-robot interaction
  • Optimized structural design to enhance operation stability and achieve lightweight, enabling the robots flexible operation and combating under complicated circumstances
